thread.title: NASA: Strong evidence of flowing water on Mars surface - KBCI CBS 2
thread.title_full: NASA: Strong evidence of flowing water on Mars surface - KBCI CBS 2 - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KBCI CBS 2
title: NASA: Strong evidence of flowing water on Mars surface - KBCI CBS 2
text:
Mars appears to have flowing streams of salty water, at least in the summer, scientists reported Monday in a finding that could have major implications for the possibility of life on the planet. Scientists in 2008 confirmed the existence of frozen water on Mars.
 KBCI CBS 2.
